casebody.data:
OHIO HIGH SCHOOL ATHLETIC ASSN.
v.
RUEHLMAN 2018-1200 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 16, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

Fischer and DeWine, JJ., dissent.

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

In Prohibition. On respondent's motion to strike the merit brief of amici curiae, Ohio School Boards Association et al. Motion denied.
